title: Trump signs Taiwan Assurance Implementation Act into law
description: United States President Donald Trump has signed into law the Taiwan Assurance Implementation Act, which requires the State Department to regularly review and update guidelines governing official U.S. interactions with Taiwan.
content:
ROC Central News Agency
12/03/2025 12:23 PM
Washington/Taipei, Dec. 3 (CNA) United States President Donald Trump has signed into law the Taiwan Assurance Implementation Act, which requires the Stat… [+2423 chars]
